name: Donkey Kong Country 2: Brigand Barrage
summary: Donkey Kong Country 2: Brigand Barrage is a boss rush ROM hack for Donkey Kong Country 2: Diddy's Kong Quest, similar to the hack Donkey Kong Country: Boss Blitz, also by the same hacker. Unlike DKC: Boss Blitz records are saved for each individual boss, as well as the total time. There is a options screen for changing various things such as starting Kong and team color. It is also possible to play with a second player and fight a single boss.
